Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets are 6-1 against Southwest Division opponents, averaging 113 points per game with a +6.4 point differential.
The Mavericks are 14-11 against Western Conference opponents, averaging 117.1 points with a +5.6 point differential.
Sengun is shooting 49.1% and averaging 18.9 points for the Rockets.
Doncic is averaging 28.1 points, 8.3 rebounds, 7.8 assists, and two steals for the Mavericks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets are shooting 44.3% from the field this season, 0.9 percentage points lower than the 45.2% the Mavericks allow to opponents.
